Mobile Phones with Largest Screen (Jul 2023)

Copy link to bookmark or share with others

List of Mobile Phones with Largest Screen (Jul 2023) with price ranging from Rs. 940 to Rs. 172,990. We have found 4165 phones. Here is the summary of the results:


Most popular phones: realme 11 Pro, realme 11 Pro Plus and OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite 5G rank high on the popularity charts.


Best phones: The best phones to buy are Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G 1TB with a spec score of 99, Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G with a spec score of 99 and Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G 512GB with a spec score of 99.


Performance: With good processor and RAM, phones such as OnePlus 11 Marble Odyssey Edition, Xiaomi 13 Proand OnePlus 11 offer good performance.


Display: Smartphones like Samsung Galaxy S20, Samsung Galaxy S10 and Samsung Galaxy S10 512GB offer sharp and vibrant screens.


Camera: For good image quality, phones such as OPPO Reno3 Pro, Samsung Galaxy Note 10 and Apple iPhone 14 Plus 512GB are good buys.


Battery: With beefy battery capacities, phones like Doogee V Max, Doogee S89 Pro and Doogee V30 can last long.


Latest Mobile Phones with Largest Screen (Jul 2023): Phones like Samsung Galaxy M34, realme Narzo 60 5G 256GB and realme Narzo 60 Pro 5G were launched in the last 30 days.
